about_the_game:
Embark on a magical journey with a cute llama lost in the vast mountains of the Bolivian Altiplano, facing many challenges as you build your llama sanctuary to protect your family. Be ready, the fate of Llamalandia is in your hands!

Discover breathtaking landscapes, explore mysterious temples, and different ecosystems filled with unique animals and secrets.

Gather valuable resources as you go. Every expedition offers a new opportunity to discover the unexpected in the vast and enchanting world of Llamalandia!

Design your llama sanctuary using the resources you gather on your adventures, and watch it grow and thrive as you progress through the game.

Build homes, farms, and other structures, each with a unique function to help you protect and care for your llama family.

Venture into the world of Llamalandia to recruit new llamas to your family, and create a unique bond and relationship with each llama you encounter.

Raise the baby llamas to take them on your adventures, watch them grow, and build the biggest and happiest llama community in the world!

Meet alpacas, guanacos, armadillos, and other cute animals from the Bolivian Altiplano. Invite them to your sanctuary, but be prepared:  because convincing them to join you will be quite a challenge.

Explore, interact, and make new friends on your journey!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350H or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Llamalandia is a cozy adventure game about finding your family and making a special bond with each llama you meet. Build your llama sanctuary to protect your family, raise the baby llamas so you can take them on your adventures, and invite other cute animals to live with you in this magical place.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
